thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 2 of 171
thread.title: John Byrne

author: John Byrne
title: John Byrne
text:
We use this site for finding house sitters for our pets. We have never been disappointed in our selection of people wanting to house sit. We get a large choice to sitters to choose from. We have used them three times now.
There was one occasion where we had a last minute pull out by a sitter due to a natural disaster in our country and was no longer travelling here. Not a problem to rectify, we emailed Trusted House sitters and we were back on the listings and we got our second house within the week of our leaving.
